charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1) NARCOTICS-SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE-Cocaine (4ss)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant committed to custody Bureau of Prisons for 240 months as to Count 4. As to Count 8, defendant committed custody Bureau of Prisons for 22 months, consecutive to sentence imposed in Count 4. As to Count 13, defendant committed to custody Bureau of Prisons for 120 months concurrent to sentences imposed in Counts 4 and 8. Defendant's total sentence with regard to Counts 4, 8 and 13 is 262 months. Additionally, as to Count 5, defendant committed to custody Bureau of Prisons for 60 months consecutive to sentences imposed in Counts 4, 8 and 13. Therefore, the total term of imprisonment is 322 months. Court recommends defendant be allowed to participate in inmate financial responsibility program for payment of $200.00 special assessment. Upon release from imprisonment, defendant placed on supervised release for 3 years concurrnet as to each count with special condition: (1) defendant shall participate in program for treatment and testing for drug/alcohol abuse and/or counselling as directed by U. S. Probation Office until released from program by U. S. Proation Office. Defendant to pay $200.00 special assessment through participation in inmate financial responsibility program. (4ss)
